title: Pulse
content:
PULSE

A Hebrew word perhaps better translated as "vegetable" (Daniel 1:12, 16). The King James Version translates it as pulse. Not wishing to eat the kingâ€™s unclean food, Daniel and his friends requested permission to live on a diet of vegetables and water. The Hebrew word translated as "vegetable" literally means "things sown" and probably includes any kind of seed that can be eaten.

See Plants.
